post.text:
Thank you to President Enrique Pena Nieto - for the invitation to meet with him in Mexico City, Mexico. Wonderful leadership and high quality people! I look forward to our next meeting. 
-Donald J. Trump

comment.author: Kelsey
comment.text: Mr. Trump. As you've got millions in your bank account, go and pay for your effin' wall on your own. You should be ashamed of the message you are spreading. Full of hate and resentment. How do you even call yourself a human?!

replies.author: Savannah
replies.text: Look at yourself in the mirror? Someone you see is the hateful one.

replies.author: Kelsey
replies.text: Making a statement such as "all of them are rapists and criminals" is not a message full of hate?! What about the hard working people, the ones that have even become veterans? No, THE MESSAGE is wrong. If you guys want to build a wall. Do it.
